channel.title: Don Ryu - Software Developer
channel.description: Don Ryu is a software developer with a passion for creating innovative web applications, who always strive to make the complex seem effortless.

item.title: A framework for hard things
item.description: You feel stressful ? You feel like giving up ? You think negatively ? If you do, this post might be for you.
